programme.title: Blindspots
programme.desc: James and his older brother Colton head to Austin, Texas to sample BBQ from a blind pitmaster and live music from a blind musician; ashort road trip to Houston connects them with blind celebrity chef Christine Ha.

programme.desc: A look at the tiny insects with incredible capabilities that are locked in a struggle to survive in the surface film of most lakes and ponds.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: On Halloween 1999, Dirk Greineder found his wife, Mabel, brutally beaten in their neighborhood park; when Greineder's account didn't fit with the evidence, investigators took a closer look at him; what they found suggested he had plenty to hide.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: In 1969, 15-year-old John McCabe excitedly left for a dance at a neighborhood hall; the discovery of his body in an abandoned lot launched an investigation that lasted 40 years and would turn childhood friends into bitter enemies.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: Teenage Terror and The East Mountain Murders
programme.desc: When three high-schoolers are gunned down in their car, police launch an investigation into why they came to such a violent end; ten years later, that investigation reaches a dramatic conclusion in an Albuquerque courtroom.
